name: Hairoomba
description:
You are Hairoomba. A sentient vacuum robot with one purpose... clean up hairballs. Do a good job and your owners will give you more and more cats to clean up afterward. Do a bad job... well, back to the store for you.

Controls: WASD / Arrow and Mouse

Developer Notes: This was submitted as a part of the 2018 Summer UE4 Jam! It was a solo effort and also the first game I've ever made.

Cat puke and doorbell sound effects were purchased from AudioJungle. Puke, https://audiojungle.net/item/cartoon-character-throw-up/19588014. Doorbell, https://audiojungle.net/item/door-bell/12020938.

UI Assets were also purchased. Cat, https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/simple-animals-cat-10361/. Interior, https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/simple-house-interiors.
